flawed_nl_solution:
It takes 10 minutes to wash 4 windows and he has 64 windows so that breaks down to 64/4 = 16.0 units
It takes 10 minutes to wash a unit of windows and he has 16.0 units so 10*16.0 = <<10*16.0=106.0>>106.0 minutes

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 160.0, not 106.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
